Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.blockentity.upgrade

Class Upgrades

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.blockentity.upgrade.Upgrades
public class Upgrades extends Object
Factory class for creating new upgrade types. These instances act as enums.

    • sendEvent

      public static <T extends IUpgradable<T, O>, O> void sendEvent(T upgradable, IUpgradeSensitiveEvent<O> event)
      Send an upgrade sensitive event over the event bus for all upgrades the upgradable has.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of upgradable.
      O - The type of event variable type.
      Parameters:
      upgradable - The upgradable instance.
      event - The event.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of upgradable.
      O - The type of event variable type.
      Parameters:
      upgradable - The upgradable instance.
      event - The event.
      upgrade - The types of upgrade this event should be sent to.
